label: ham
subject: Virginia Tech killer's family: We are 'living a nightmare'
body: 118 (return) [ Synesius had previously represented his own disqualifications. He loved profane studies and profane sports; he was incapable of supporting a life of celibacy; he disbelieved the resurrection; and he refused to preach _fables_ to the people unless he might be permitted to _philosophize_ at home. Theophilus primate of Egypt, who knew his merit, accepted this extraordinary compromise.]
